caption: We had one of the best dinners here at Ciro's. The food is outstanding. For apps we had the eggplant and calamari. For dinner we had primavera, pork special, swordfish and manicotti. Everything is homemade and fresh. The dressings were fabulous. The red sauce was so fresh you could taste the garden tomatoes. No canned tomatoes here. The owner Anthony stopped by our table and went over the specials with us in detail then went in the kitchen and cooked everything to order.

This place is impeccable it is beautiful sparkly everything looks clean and even the owner came out to meet and greet me the food is delicious and it's in a very nice location that is off to the side and private even though half of it is on a main Street. I definitely recommend it and trust me everybody listens to mamma Mia they will be pulling up!!!

Very happy to find the quality of food continuing at Marks new venture Cotton Hollow kitchen. From the delicious beet salad to the cassoulet, to the pumpkin cheesecake The flavors, presentation, freshness made dinner here exceptional. Anxious to return again and again to work through the unique menu and make this a regular stop for lunch and dinner .

This restaurant is amazing! Thank you Anthony for the great food and conversation. He really puts passion into his food. The food is fresh and made from scratch. Everything is made to perfection! He even surprised us with cappuccino on the back deck.  I will definitely return again!

I go here once a week or so, and everything I have ordered has always been fresh, and good,  the owner usually surprises me with a free appetizer (of his choosing & usually not even on the menu)all of which are excellent. On the weekends they usually have some kind of live music, which is nice too. So I like to come on Friday or Saturday for the music (which is a added bonus)

This was our first time to Ciros!!! It was for a wedding party. Food was excellent, full bar, and great, friendly, and attentive people working there!!! Currently offering outdoor dining due to COVID19 restrictions by the state. Will definitely be returning here. As a Springfield Massachusetts Resident, my wife and I have been going to, and searching for good places to enjoy an evening out as our city has become  a great go to destination with MGM Casino nearby!!! If your in the area call to reserve a table, and you will be glad you did!!! Thank you Ciros for a great experience!!! Located at 904 Main street in Springfield Massachusetts!!!

First time here I had a great experience with a friendly bartender and great staff. Food was absolutely excellent. Second time here and the food was even better. I had the Manicotti which was phenomenal. Tomato sauce is made from real tomatoes and the manicotti were stuffed with meat. The owner sent out several samples while I was here and everything was delicious.
Because it's Italian restaurant love the food
Chicken picata was delicious
This place had Issues
Best place to enjoy great food with your family i know they made me feel like family

From the moment we walked thru the doors, the warm welcome and love captured us. We have been to Little Italy in New York City and Boston and this by far cannot compare to the greatness and the true Italian flavor that is available here in Springfield. The hospitality and homemade marinara sauce is to die for. Anthony introduced us to two delicious meals. The rib eye and the pork chops were out of this world. Just go one block away, MGM will charge you double the price.  Thank you Anthony, Martin,Elizabeth, Jeremy, Gary.
Amazing food with an even more amazing staff.

I was here for the After Party of the Anthony Laureano fight at the MGM. Got to try the whole menu, EVERYTHING was delicious! Chicken Franchise, meatball rigatoni, House meatballs. Everything was out of this world! To die for. Best Italian food outside of New York. Better then some of these Bozos here in New York. Periodt.
Amazing food. Felt like I was eating my own Nonna's home cooked italian food. If you're from out of town, this is a place you must stop and have a meal. Absolutely amazing
Loved the food, owner and staff! Excellent value!
Excellent food and the absolute best service. Great value! Thank you!

Food was excellent and portions are very generous. The owner and wait staff are very kind and provided excellent service. We had the Margherita pizza, Mussels, an eggplant appetizer, Ravioli, Chicken Parmigiana and Halibut...everything was very fresh and tasted excellent. Atmosphere is very cozy..we love the place...thank you!
(Translated by Google) Excellent!!!  (Original) Excelente!!!
Is a very fine. Bar

Great place to bring your family. Food is amazing especially the sword fish. Wow. It made me feel like I was in Italy. And I've been to quite a few restaurants but this one take the cake when it comes to Italian cuisine 5 star all day what a great place to be if u love Italian cuisine.

My name is not Karen... But I did speak to the manager tonight. Let me first say that the food and ingredients are great. They use local businesses for their meat, pasta (Milanos), and desserts (La Fiorintina).  Beyond that, the experience was terrible. The management was even worse. I called for reservations for a table of 9 and asked if they would be ok with kids to celebrate my birthday. The manager (or owner) said it was fine. We showed up just before our reservation time and were told that our table was given to another party (the restaurant was not full so we only waited a few minutes). We tried ordering the house red, but they were out (at 6:30 on a Saturday) and they offered us another Malbec. Except not at the $6/glass price (actually $7/glass but I guess the menu is wrong)...it took 25 minutes to get the drinks. Next, it took 25 minutes to order an appetizer and another 20 minutes to order our main. We did not get our main course until 1 hour and 50 minutes after sitting down. My wife's soup was cold, my mother's salad did not come with dressing on the side (both were corrected). At this point, I went to speak to the manager and he tried to explain away the mistakes on the server ("she's only worked here 3 days) -- who leaves a new waitress alone, without help? (Again the restaurant has 7 tables of 20 full.) My mother's main came with the wrong pasta and she ordered another Malbec that was replaced with a red table wine. I tried leaving... But my wife had ordered canolis and 2 coffees... This took another 15 minutes to get to the table. The hostess came up as we were paying the bill to ask if everything was fine and we were honest that we were not satisfied... The manager came over again and insisted that it was not his fault... And then said "it's hard getting out with kids" ...eye roll. We said the food was great but service was not and walked out the door. He followed us out and suggested we try another Italian restaurant like Red Rose. Here's the thing, we've been here before and had good results and wanted Ciro's, not Red Rose. But this guy couldn't own up to his own and staffs faults. So, like he recommended to us, I pass to you: go to another Italian restaurant in the South End of Springfield. We will pass from now on and not recommend this place any more.

Nice and good atmosphere. Had the antipasto for an app, steak for dinner  and mini cannolis and espresso for dessert. Service was very good. Will definitely go again. Just a small issue with no tiramisu for dessert, they were all out.
Excellent
Food is delicious and service is the best! I would give them 10 stars if I could. Highly recommend if you want quality, made with love Italian food.
It became obvious I was not the clientele they wanted to cater to. Basic ignorance and busy w busy...
Awesome spot. Food was excellent and has an awesome atmosphere. Highly recommend

I live about 20 minutes away from our local Carrabba's (West Springfield, Mass) I paid for the meals, but I didn't check the bags to make sure that the orders were correct (and they weren't) and I discovered the wrong order after I got home. I called the manager and he insisted on making it right. I drove back to the restaurant, he brought the correct order to me and apologized for the mistake.

Ciro's is the Cheers of Italian restaurants! They remember you , what you ordered (even if you've only been there once) and treat you like royalty. They deliberately space out the courses to make it a memorable experience. Anyone who reviewed it differently simply didn't understand. It is a European dining experience. Simply  put - a meal to be shared and savored. Can't wait to go back.

Outstanding food some of  the best Italian food I’ve ever had. Also the service has never been better . The owner Anthony takes such pride in his restaurant it made the experience 5star . We will be back.
You need to come and try for yourself! Food and Service is outstanding !
Great food, great atmosphere.
Place was awesome, service was spectacular! Thank you Anthony for your kindness and hospitality! Food was very Good!
Excellent food, excellent service.  Ambiance was very nice.  A nice find.
Always a very good meal and pleasant staff
Always enjoy coming to Ciro’s! The food is phenomenal and the owner, Anthony is so gracious and hospitable every time we’re there.

I go here once a week or so, and everything I have ordered has always been fresh, and good,  the owner usually surprises me with a free appetizer (of his choosing & usually not even on the menu)all of which are excellent. On the weekends they usually have some kind of live music, which is nice too. So I like to come on Friday or Saturday for the music (which is a added bonus)

Excellent authentic Italian restaurant with made to order dishes. The atmosphere is romantic and clean. The staff are more than accomadating and attentive. Just delicious and we'll well worth the visit.
Great pizza oven and staff
Great Service!
Very tasty.  Very good server.  Had an enjoyable experience.
Food was awesome.
Great food. Great service. Worth the price.
Great food Tony

Ciro's was absolutely amazing! I can't begin to explain how delicious the food is here. Everything tastes exactly how you expect authentic Italian food to taste. My wife and I had a great time. The staff was fun and friendly, very professional and inviting people. You will love the atmosphere here, feeling like family is cooking for you. This was our first time and will most definitely not be our last.
While the food here is awesome, the service is why you will definitely want to come back. Owner is friendly, staff is welcoming and accommodating, the entertainment is off the hook.

Excellent!  Great, friendly service, delicious FRESH food!  Planned a quick bite before attending a comedy show at MGM ROAR at Red Rose, over an hour wait at 5:15 PM, prompted us to explore other options in the area.  So glad we did!  We did not have a reservation but were seated immediately and received superior service the entire time we were there.  We will definitely return.

If you haven’t eaten here you must. The food was out of this world. I was at a lost for words eating everything I tried tonight. The drinks was also great. Follow by the excellent service we received from Carla. As well the owner made us feel so welcome and recommend some great dishes. Thanks for everything guys I will be back again soon.
Excellent food...exceptional staff....wonderful atmosphere...lovely live music

THE Best authentic and traditional Italian restaurant in the region. I could go on for hours about how great Ciro's is  but you just have to experience it yourself. The gnocchis are just like Noni used to make.
great food and hospitality, they really make you feel special and like family
It was fine
Outstanding!

We were in town on business and found this restaurant on Main Street, Springfield, MA. Nice lighting, modern ambiance -can see what is being cooked in the kitchen . The meatballs were excellent and the eggplant rollatini was the best I ever had. Food reasonably priced with everything that we ordered.  A hidden gem with a New York chic ambiance.  I highly recommend it..  Giovanna

Service was really slow despite the fat that the restaurant was almost empty, the ceiling was leaking like from 3 different spots, the food took way to long (we’re talking of something around 1 hour to an hour and twenty minutes) for no apparent reason because it was dead in there, it’s over price. And if that wasn’t enough the owner try to buy good reviews with some free appetizers. HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE AND HORRIBLE MANAGEMENT!
One of the best, most authentic Italian restaurants in Downtown Springfield
Food delicious, bartender Cayla awesome!!
Best Italian Restaurant in Massachusetts. I reside in Boston and have eaten at the best Italian Restaurants in the city. Ciros has them beat by miles. Absolutely fabulous! Everything is so DELICIOUS!
Fabulous food!! If you haven't been there I highly recommend this gem on Main Street in Spfld!!
Fabulous holiday meal for large number of lawyers
Very awesome food great service
Great food,. Great service and we walked to the casino afterwards.

Restaurant is much smaller than pictures show online, though small nice enough.  Server was punctual and attentive.  Restaurant was a bit less than 50% full, drinks took awhile to get and all kitchen food was extremely slow.  Appetizers took at least 20 minutes to get, we had to ask where they were and was told kitchen was working on it now.  Though we said we did not want all food to come at same time, salads and dinner also took extremely long time.  All in all a 6:00 reservation where we sat at 6:15 (our fault) left the restaurant at 9:45. We watched at a table of 10 left prior to receiving their dinner as they had been there for 2 hours and hadn't received food yet.   If you're looking for a dinner night, way too long, if you're looking for an evening out, can do better with atmosphere and kitchen service.  Food was decent, though not worth the extensive delay.   Kitchen has a lot to learn.  Management/owner needs to pay attention or they will not survive.  Wouldn't recommend.
Amazing food!!!! And the best pizza i ever had!!!!
The Bomb!!! Best food and bartender ever

Our first time to visit this restaurant and will definitely return.  The food was excellent.  Loved the eggplant rollatini!  Service was outstanding.  All food made from from order, which means it takes a bit more time, but it gave us time to talk. If you haven't been there, go.  You may need reservation for a weekend night.

This was my first time here and I have to say that this place was amazing! The food was outstanding.  From the grilled roman (yes, roman) to the home made pastas, and desserts.  I cannot emphasize on how amazing this was.  It's  so fresh and flavorful, so there is a long wait(this is a GREAT thing) but it is 100% worth it.  MUST TRY!! I can't wait to bring my family and friends there again. Thank you for such an amazing experience.
Definitely quaint,upscale,atmosphere,decent finger foods,and Dining...casual,and dress mix.

It was horrible. Food took 3 hours to get to our table and it came out cold and the meatballs were cold and seemed undercooked. Not good at all I don’t recommend. The mash potatoes were freezing cold and so was everything else. We are not happy.
Didn't like the food to salty
Great food.
Wonderful atmosphere,  excellent tasting food, excellent service!! This place is going to make it's mark.
Server was really nice and food was good.
We loved this place...food was amazing! Worth the wait....everything is made from scratch....will definitely go back.
Food was great and the service just as great. We will go back!
Love it ❤️
Food was great service was awesome Anthony Bruno you are the best!!
Great food and people
I loved everything about this place and their open late

First off, I found this establishment to be quite elegant, very worthy of any type of formal gathering or special date night. While this was my first visit, there was a gentleman playing love music on a piano that I felt enhanced the experience. We were greeted by Anthony who, quite honestly provided some of the best service, as well as Kheagan, (forgive me if I misspelled his name) our waiter. Anthony has a passion about great Italian food and flavors and his mission is make sure you leave happy.  There is a bar area where there are 24 different taps if I remember correctly, and even an area where you can sit and look directly into the kitchen where you can see the great chefs prepare each meal.  We were seated and treated with fresh bread and oil, glasses of water, and orders were soon taken afterwards which included either a choice if soup or salad. I ordered the Chicken Parmagiana as my entree, and to my surprise, I was shocked, to great satisfaction at the sheer size of the portion/serving. The thing that impressed me most was the fact that the breading on the Chicken Parm still had that slight crunch instead of being "soggy" from the sauce that usually covers it. Both Anthony and Kheagan would come and check on us periodically to make sure everything was ok and believe me, things were fantastic.  This establishment is going to have a special "Grand Opening" on Tuesday,  August 14, with special live entertainment, with a new outdoor patio opening up as well. As for the experience and services received, I plan on continuing to return and support this business.
Was do delicious.... Food taste garden to table ready..... Staff was great.... Fyi get the margarita!!!!!

Food was kinda expensive. Disappointed when I was served Veal Parmesan when I ordered CHICKEN PARMESAN. I DON'T EAT VEAL. I ate a few bites and was grossed out. The only good thing about the visit was Jerryoke Karaoke. Drinks WAY TOO EXPENSIVE

Another 5 star dinner at Ciros!  Brought an Italian couple to dinner for the first time and they loved it. Its everything an upscale Italian restaurant should be. Good service, amazing food and they make you feel like family.
Great meal - excellent service
Anthony the owner was incredibly attentive and generous.  Our Bartender Grace was amazing
FANTASTIC dinner!! And the service was impeccable!
Amazing food
Amazing, authentic food and ambiance. Great love music. LOVE!!
We go for the Tuesday night Kareoke 6pm to 10pm and love the food an the service.

Got there  early for a birthday dinner celebration. Sat at the bar which was out of Peroni (an ITALIAN beer!!!) and 2 other selections. Bartender, while she was courteous, was less than engaging or helpful in alternate selections. The back of the bar that's visible was a shambles, which visually maybe was an omen. Got to the table. Ordered appetizers and was given 2 free antipastos while we waited and waited for fried cheese and a salad. Neither met expectations. Very over cooked cheese and salad that had seen better days, fresh-wise. Ordered dinner and waited again. More free antipasto. Son's pasta arrived about 3 minutes premature of al dente (raw and tough), other half's gnocchi was either overcooked into paste or raw hard dumplings. My veal chop was raw. Not rare. Raw. One side had a semi browning to it. The other side was just grey. The potatoes and butternut squash sides were hard as rocks they were so undercooked. A side of broccoli rabe came 20 minutes into the meal and was in a dish with about 3/4 cup of olive oil. The waitress checked in now and then. The place was not hopping, especially for an early Saturday night.  The owner or manager ( we asked but the waitress demurred on which) was talking to guests and on his phone. The kitchen needs someone running it. Checking timing and quality of food coming out. It's a shame because we live VERY close by and was hoping that we had found a new hangout. We eat out routinely 2-3 times a week. While the decor is nice and the live jazz was incredible, the quality of food and service just won't bring us back. It's not an inexpensive place to dine, so the bar is a bit higher.  While we are dedicated to supporting small businesses - especially now that MGM will be calling the shots  -  Ciro's is a "tradition" that maybe should have stayed a memory.
Nice to have them back. Great food

The staff was friendly..the owner , very nice..the decor was very nice. You can sit in front of the kitchen and watch meals be prepared by the chef. There was no one else in the whole resturant except our party of 4. Thursday night 630pm.  We were given a complementary antipasto,  which was yummy. Ordered the fried fontina cheese was a bit over cooked. Our dinners were good but not great. I ordered dessert , which was a canolli with a choice of blueberry or strawberry sauce ..they were out of sauce. Cancelled dessert. Drinks were a bit high $. service was slow but our waitress was very nice, and waiting for your food on a busy night,  that can be understandable but we were the only patrons.  We were at the restaurant for 2 And a half hours. Going to give it another try once the casino opens.
A great spot for karaoke on Tuesday s! Friendly and talented staff are always ready to serve you what you requested.

I am all for supporting small business and I hope they can make it....ate there for the first time yesterday. The service is extremely slow.  And it appeared that people sitting around us had the same complaint. It’s not that the restaurant was busy as there were only 50 people if that there at that time. We were told they had run out of wine glasses and with wine at $10 a glass please don’t serve wine in water goblets. Food was presented nicely when it finally came but for people that are eating there before going to a show, hockey game whatever I would go elsewhere as you will never make it to where you are going on time. Lots to do before the casino opens...
great atmosphere

New restaurant location, disappointed with the service and food.  Server never told us about the specials, heard about them after we ordered from another server at a close by table.  Food was not that good  for supposedly a long time Italian restaurant.
Fantastic food! Highly recommend!
A warm and welcoming place with friendly and talented staff.
The food is fabulous and the service is spot on with a nice atmosphere.

Excellent food an beautiful atmosphere! I can't wait to go back. Being in the food business myself it is very hard to find a quality meal with good service. Our server was excellent!!! And the food was amazing and plated beautifully. Going back on thanksgiving eve for the live entertainment. 👍🏼 Here are some pictures of the veal saltimboca and the surf and turf special.
Without question the best restaurant in Springfield
Ok good but tough service. The hostess bailed them out!!
Food was great, service needs some work

Ciro's A Tradition is a new restaurant in Springfield on Main Street. The food is wonderful and fresh, the meat is exceptional, particularly the pork chop and veal. My group tasted the eggplant rollatini and found it to be the best we had ever had.  The ambience of this restaurant is unusually pleasant, with lovely lighting and an open kitchen concept, full bar.  I highly recommend it.
